name: New Zealand
overview: New Zealand is a safe, peaceful, and student-friendly country known for its high-quality education system, globally recognised qualifications, and excellent quality of life. The country offers a practical, research-driven learning environment with strong industry connections, making graduates highly employable worldwide.

whyStudyInNewZealand.title: Globally Recognised Education
whyStudyInNewZealand.description: New Zealand qualifications are recognised worldwide and follow a practical, industry-focused learning approach.

whyStudyInNewZealand.title: Safe & Peaceful Country
whyStudyInNewZealand.description: New Zealand consistently ranks among the safest countries in the world, offering a secure environment for international students.

whyStudyInNewZealand.title: Post-Study Work Opportunities

whyStudyInNewZealand.title: Excellent Quality of Life
whyStudyInNewZealand.description: New Zealand offers a balanced lifestyle with clean cities, natural beauty, and a welcoming multicultural society.

whyStudyInNewZealand.title: Work While Studying
whyStudyInNewZealand.description: Students can work up to 25 hours per week during study and full-time during scheduled holidays.

whyStudyInNewZealand.title: PR & Long-Term Opportunities
whyStudyInNewZealand.description: Clear pathways are available for permanent residency under the Skilled Migrant Category.
